description:
A strange record featuring otherworldly music that is to die for bewitches people in the first segment. In the second, a young girl fed up with unwanted attention decides to move in with her aunt, only to learn she has a lot more to lose than just her privacy.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chuuko Record / Michi no Nai Machi
Used Record / Town of No Roads
中古レコード / 道のない街
